subject: Thank you for your recent refinance debt request, we are accepting your debt request
body:
Your credit score doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE pin money to spend ANY way you like, or simply require to LOWER your current payments by a third or more, here is the deal we can offer you TODAY (hurry, this tender will expire THIS EVENING):
$326,000+ debt
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest monthly payments!
Hurry, when best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply finish this plain form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!
http://luvuiiksheap.com/
